mapper.select: SELECT user_id, nick_name, created_time, updated_time FROM user
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, nick_name, password, salt, created_time, updated_time) VALUES(#{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
